rules_text:
Haste
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Daisy, Spirited Lifter attacks and isn't blocked, you and the defending player create a tapped Treasure token.
[i]Balmung[/i] – Daisy can't be blocked except by creatures with haste.
Partner with Patty, Youthful Theif [i](When this creature enters, target player may put Patty into their hand from their library, then shuffle.)[/i]
